Author: LuKiOMFG
Text: I'm 5'10, but my thinspo is usually between 5'3-5'6. Yet to find anyone my height as thinspo, most are too thin for me or don't have the same curves as I do. I have a large chest and hide hips that don't go away with weight loss. I usually go off chest/waist/hip ratios for my thinspo.

Author: ap0cryphal
Text: Yep, I based my UGW on the (reported) weights of thinspo who are the same height as me. Not sure how accurate those reports are but I’m going off them anyway ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
